methods.name: UpdateAppearance
methods.description: Updates the button appearance with current property values. Call this after changing multiple properties for a single repaint.

methods.name: About
methods.description: Displays control name and version information in a MessageBox.

events.name: ControlReady
events.description: Fired when WebView2 is fully initialized and ready for use.

events.name: ButtonClicked
events.description: Fired when the button is clicked.

events.name: MouseEnter
events.description: Fired when the mouse enters the button area.

events.name: MouseLeave
events.description: Fired when the mouse leaves the button area.

properties.name: IsReady
properties.description: Gets whether WebView2 is fully initialized and ready.

properties.name: Text
properties.description: Gets or sets the button text.

properties.name: BackgroundColor
properties.description: Gets or sets the button background color (CSS color format, e.g., "#3498db" or "blue").

properties.name: TextColor
properties.description: Gets or sets the button text color (CSS color format).

properties.name: HoverColor
properties.description: Gets or sets the button hover background color (CSS color format).

properties.name: FontSize
properties.description: Gets or sets the button font size in pixels.

properties.name: FontFamily
properties.description: Gets or sets the button font family (CSS font-family format).

properties.name: BorderRadius
properties.description: Gets or sets the button border radius in pixels (for rounded corners).

properties.name: Enabled
properties.description: Gets or sets whether the button is enabled.
